reviews.review:
1500 Horas de jogo e subindo!

O jogo é divertido, você toma uns sustos de vez em quando, passa raiva e tudo mais e com ele vem um teste pessoal, com esse jogo você consegue saber se tem tendências masoquistas ou não.. Ah mas por quê?

O jogo tem lá seus bugs, problemas de matchmaking, hits que não acontecem, "coisas sobrenaturais" em fim... 

Então logo que... Você consegue continuar jogando o jogo mesmo ele sendo isso tudo ? Parabéns! (ou não) você é um masoquista!
You did a good job bhvr Kappa

This game is a ton of fun. Dead by Daylight is a cooperative that rewards teamwork, but does not force it. Helping your fellow survivors get objectives will reward you with extra points and move things along faster, but it could also be your downfall if mistakes are made. 

I have had this game since release and I have been pleased with the attention the Devs have given it so far. The two major cons about this game are the horrible lobby system and some balancing issues with the perks. The past few updates have made changes to perks in an attempt to balance the playing field for both survivor and killer. I have not noticed any updates to the lobby system, so hopefully that comes soon. 

I have had some awesome moments in this game. Plenty of suspense and "holy sh1t" moments.

Highly recommend this game!
Игра хорошая но из-за багов может пригореть

This game is seriously so much dub. I first heard about it from Dashie on YouTube and immediately had to buy it. I played for five hours straight. From the survivor view, it's all about team work. Even though the game is repetitive it NEVER gotnold or boring. The game is still fairly new so there are a few minor glitches. The most annoying one being not able to join a lobby constantly. But spamming the join lobby button seems to work just fine. I can't wait for DLC for this game.

Apparently my review got deleted? Hmmmm, funny.

Well, I've been playing since way back when, had a typed up coherent review, apparently after years it's gone.

It's great concept that for all the years it's been around, has never been fully realized, and it's because the Devs are terrible. They can't balance anything, and at this point, they're just as greedy and focused on taking as much money from you as they can. If you've never played before, don't.

Glad I could save that money for you. Go buy a good game.

Значит так, ищешь ты с другом каточку. Всё классно , нашли хоста(маньяка) и начали грузится . Две минуты грузится, пять минут грузится. Наконец-то, подумал ты, а вот нихуя. Добро пожаловать к лаганному хосту, и загрузилось вас не 4 человека ,а только ты с другом . Вот твоего друга убивают. И ты пол часа заводишь 2 сраных генератора, чтобы открыть люк, который ещё нужно найти. И вот ещё 10 мин ты его ищешь, попутно заводя лаганные генераторы и скрываясь от маньяка. И вот в очередной пробежке от маньяка ТЫ НАХОДИШЬ МАТЬ ЕГО ЛЮК и уже собираешься в него прыгнуть... А ВОТ НИХУЯ. И вот ты с лицом полного изумления смотришь на застывшую картинку: отвиснет или  нет. А потом твоему взору предстоёт ОНО - окно со СРАНОЙ ошибкой , где разрабы приносят извинения от всего сердца. "Да пошли вы нахрен" -     промелькает в голове и с чуством разочарования удаляешь игру. Так вот к чему я. Игра отличная, вот только баги мешают.ОЧЕНЬ мешают. Пока 5/10. Без лагов на твёрдую 8/10.
nice game. realytrue
新手上手，连发电机都找不到，无限被砍，无限被挂，但还是挺欢乐的

Ein wirklich sehr unterhaltsames Spiel. Habe schon einige Stunden darin verbracht und es macht mir immer noch sehr viel Spaß. 
Was mich stört, sind Killer die bei ihren aufgehängten Opfern campen. Des weiteren das finden einer Lobby unter Freunden ist schwer und sollte noch gefixt werden, hier wäre eine "Serverliste" abhelfen.
In Zukunft hoffe ich auf mehr Content, z.B. Spielmodi oder neue Killer/Opfer.

Herkese selamlar öncelikle bu oyun hayatta kalma esaslı bir korku oyunu olarak tanıtılsada korkunç değil şöyle değil çünkü katilinde bir oyuncu olduğunu biliyorsunuz ama evet doğru söylicem geriliyorsunuz oyunu açıklayalım şimdi.

Oyun 4 survivor 1 killer olarak başlıyor...

SURVIVOR AMAÇ...
Haritada bulunan jeneratörlerden 5 tanesini tamir edip çıkış kapısından kaçmak

[Alternatif Kaçış]:
Eğer haritada tek survivor siz kaldıysanız, haritanın rasgele bir yerinde bir kapak var oyun esnasındada görebilirsiniz ama sadece tek survivor siz kaldıysanız ve 2 tane jeneratör tamir edilmişse kapak açılır ve direk kaçabilirsiniz.

KILLER AMAÇ:
Haritadaki bütün survivorları kancalara asarak öldürmek.

OYUN HAKKINDA GECEL BİLGİLER:
1-  Survivorlar jeneratör tamir ederken (Space tuşu) kaçırırlarsa jeneratör arıza yapar hem ses çıkarır katilin sizi nerde olduğunuzu bulmasını kolaylaştırır hem de tamir etme ilerlemesi geriler.

2-  Survivorlar katil peşlerindeyse kıvrak hareketlerle saldırılardan kaçıp katilin önüce tahtalar düşürüp yavaşlatabilirler katil bu tahtaları kırabilir veya etrafında dolanabilir. Kaçarken pencerelerden atlayabilirsiniz katilin pencerelerden geçme süresi daha uzundur ama unutmayın KATİL HERZAMAN DAHA HIZLI KOŞAR

3-  Kalp atışınız arttıysa hemen panik yapmayın SAKIN DOLAPLARA SAKLANMAYIN ÇOK RİSKLİ önce katilin nerden geldiğini anlamaya çalışın ondan sonra çömelin ve bir çalının arasına saklanabilrsiniz ve kıpırdamayın katilin sizi farketmesi çok zorlaşır ve unutmayın katil FPS modunda görür etrafı

4-  Eğer dolaplarda uzun düre kalırsanız jeneratör patlaması gibi bir ses çıkar ama bunu siz duymassınız sadece katil duyar tavsiye 1 dakikadan önce dolaptan çıkın

5-  Survivor koşarken hem daha çok ses çıkarır hemde arkasında kırmızı bir iz bırakır bu izi sadece katil görür. Bu izler bir süre sonra kaybolur ama katilin yerinizi bulma olasılığı artar mümkün olduğunca yürüyün.

6-  Beraber dolaşın özellikle arkadaşlarınızla girerseniz rahat olursunuz ama tek girersenizde birilerini bulmaya çalışın tek başınıza hayatta kalmanız biraz zor olabilir.

7-  Kancadan kaçmaya çalışmayın asıldıysanız bekleyin arkadaşlarınız sizi kurtarmaya gelebilir ama bazen katil başınızda bekler öylece siz yinede (Space tuşuna) basmayın en azından diyerlerine zaman kazandırırsınız hem şansa kurtuldunuz diyelim katil hemen dibinizde zaten hemen yakalanırsınız ama katil yakında değil ve kimse kurtarmaya gelmiyorsa %5 civarı bir şansınız var deneyebilirsiniz

8-  En fazla 3 asılmaya ölürsünüz asıldınız diyelim hemen kurtardılar ama gene yakalanıp asıldınız bu sefer karakter dayanmak zorundadır ama üçüncü kez asarsa sizi katil kesin ölürsünüz ve asıldınız diyelim yine ama geç kurtardılar sizi 2. asılmaya da ölebilirsiniz.

9- Katilde doğru (Skill) varsa sizi asmadan direkt öldürebilir yerdeyken

10-  Loot yapın haritanın çeşitli yerlerinde sandıklar var içlerine bakın bu arada sandıklara bakarken bir miktar ses çıkarırsınız katil yakındaysa yerinizi fark edebilir (Kesin sandık yeri=Katilin Basementi)

11-  Katil mümkün olduğunca Basemente asmaya çalışsın çünkü ordan kaçma ihtimalleri çok düşük

12-  Katili asla durduramazsınız sadece yavaşlatablirsiniz

13-  Her katile karşı ayrı bir oynama şekli vardır en çok oynanan katillerden ''Trapper'' dan koşarak kaçmanız bayaa zordur en hızlı katillerden biridir çünkü eğer katil ''Trapper'' ise jeneratörlerin yanlarına dikkat edin tuzak olabilir. Katilin ''Trapper'' olduğunu anlamanız için görmenize gerek yok etrafta alınmayı bekleyen ayı kapanları görürseniz katil ''Trapper''dır

14-  Katil haritadaki herşeyi görebilir ve çok büyük olasılıkla jeneratörler arasında turlayacaktır.

15-  Katil jeneratörlere bakarken kaç piston çalışıyor baksın eğer 4 pistondan 3'ü çalışıyorsa çok büyük olasılıkla siz ordan uzaklaşınca survivorlar gelip tamire devam edicek bunu lehinize çevirebilirsiniz

16-  Katil 2 vuruşta survivoru yere düşürebilir. Survivor bir kere hasar alırsa bir anlık hız patlaması yaşar ve katilden anlık uzaklaşır. Katil survivora bir isabet verirse bir an durur ve survivor o sırada kaçması için bir şans oluşur.

17-  Survivorlar yaralı ise bir an önce ya başka birini bulup iyileştirilmeli ya da medkitle kendini iyileştirmeli çünkü hem ses çıkarır hemde arkasında kan izi bırakır

18-  KATİLDEN KAÇMANIN TEK YOLU KATİL GİBİ DÜŞÜNMEKTİR

LOOTLAR:

Medkit:Kendi kendinizi iyileştirmenizi sağlar ya da yaralanan başka birini daha hızlı iyileştirmenizi sağlar

Repair Box:Jeneratörleri daha hızlı tamir etmenizi sağlar

El Feneri: Katilin gözüne tutarsanız bir an stun yer ve sırtında biri varsa yere düşer

Harita:Yakındaki nesneleri görmenizi sağlar

OYUNU KESİNLİKLE TAVSİYE EDERİM

从16年8月入坑，断断续续玩了300+小时，这是我在steam玩游戏以来第一次刷差评，为什么？我理解官方的初衷是想让人类玩家尽量苟着让屠夫去找人的一个游戏，所以一直都没有写评测。我是主玩屠夫的玩家，虽然屠夫玩的很烂。我从上个版本玩的时候就感觉人类已经被中幅度削弱，这一点和官方的初衷一样，我也不反对，但是这个版本我要过来刷个差评。写出几点我认为不推荐的理由。
理由一：从杀机官方开始加强屠夫削弱人类开始，我就一直搞不清楚一个问题，这么长时间了，难道你们官方就没有看出这个游戏的矛盾点在哪吗？？？？？？是修电机速度！！！！！修电机速度！！！！！修电机速度！！！！段位稍微高一点的屠夫都会带恶咒，虽然我的恶咒经常开局秒炸QAQ,矛盾点既然大家都清楚，为什么不改进和平衡呢？
理由二：你游更新bug一堆，pretty good job so far？？？？？
理由三：现在这个版本的刀气，真40m长，好几次我跨出窗户走了两三步，被砍倒，真的nb
理由四：外挂和刷学点还是有不少，像某位4飞南瓜头火衣dalao。
理由五：以前的双擦刀，现在又回来了，玩nm，叠到满砍一刀，人类根本跑不远，玩个阿姆斯特朗回旋加速阿姆斯特朗蛇皮，zz。
最后看看官方你自己怎么作死，在这样下去，卸载再你妈的见！

Если хотите ждать несколько часов игру она для вас.

This game is tons of fun, with that being said, the FIRST thing someone should probably do while making a game is figure out all the technical issues first. Me and a couple friends just sat in a lobby for 10 minutes, at least trying to get a game started and could not find one. 
   The only way the developers will fix this is if they notice a decline in the game. Love the game (if i'm playing by myself) but we're in an age now where multiplayer is a must-have for video games and when simple things like not being able to find a game for 10 minutes happens the game doesn't want to be played. Fix this issue and we'll be all good.

!!READ BEFORE BUYING!!

This game is a great game for people who have friends to play with and are willing to put down $20. It is a very interactive game where you run from the killer and try to repair generators to make an escape. There are only a couple of issues I have with the game and I will list them below:

Match making is absolutely trash! - Like I said above, this is great game to play with your friends, but it is almost IMPOSSIBLE to find a game online. It will go through the same process every 5 seconds. You will tell your friends to "Ready up" and then you wait for the timer to go down to 0 seconds left and then it will tell you "No matches have been found" and then you will have to ready up AGAIN and AGAIN and AGAIN (This process usually takes around 20 - 30 minutes if you qued up with 4 people). Once you actually get into a game you are looking forward to be playing against a level 10- (20 being the worst and 1 being the best) and getting demolished because they know the tactics and you don't. The game dosen't have any balance to it when it comes to queing people to their ranks, so if you are going to get it make sure you are ready to be patient for games and learn fast.

Lots of bugs - When you are new to the game you won't know what is going on with yoyur match making so when you first "Ready up" it will say "Searching for matches" and then it will stay like that, but instead of the button saying "Unready" it says "Ready" which makes you want to click it. Don't get me wrong, this is a very small glitch, but it is just one out of the many I wanted to point out.

Boosting is a thing - Sometimes you will get paired up with a killer who doesn't do anything and stands next to you and watches you fix all of the generators. Sure, it might be great for your bloodweb (Money/points), but it just ruins the game and you have to find another que which will take 30 minutes.

I just feel like this game was very rushed and I was going to refund it, but I thought I would give it one last chance before I do and I went over the time required to be able to refund it just because I had to sit in a lobby with my friends and wait for 30 minutes at a time. I will remove a big chunk of this review the day they fix match making, but for now I would say this game is not worth buying. ESPECIALLY if you don't have friends to play with.

RATINGS /10: (Not exagerated)
Match making: 1/10
Community: 3/10
Beginner friendly: 6/10
Adrenaline pumping: 8/10
Fun: 6/10 (When with friends)

So really I don't usually do this but I really do like this game. Played quite a bit on it and of course with that being said, I don't understand why people complain about other survivors not going after them when a killer body camps. Honestly team work is a thing yes sometimes. But if you are on a hook and being body camped you can buy the others more time. That's how I see it though when I play I do try to rescue as many people as possible if I can manage it. 

Of course the only thing I don't really like about the game are as follows;

1: Finding a match can be near impossible sometimes. I think they need to work on this at least a little bit. Perhaps find an easier way to set it up so matches can be found instead of spending 10 minutes looking for one only to have the killer disconnect or just leave for some reason or another.

2: The chainsaw guys move that allows him to do a one hit knock down and can also hit people AFTER they vault. like I figure the ability needs some form of cool down. It doesn't bother me if the map or the setting is more in the favor of the killer but I feel like this is just a little too massively OP for that. Let them keep it but like how our perks have at least some form of cool downs, the killers should be the same.

3: Now this one I don't think they can do much about but it bothers a lot of players I have noticed. Cause it's something people constantly complain about. And honestly yes I was annoyed about it at first but really the way I look at it, if the killer is body camping you. Then well you must have annoyed him enough to have him keep his eyes on you at all times or he just wants the easy points. But whatever make his life heck and don't struggle. Make him wait around till the prompt comes up then STRUGGLE. people can literally finish two or three gens in that time period, I've seen it happen. So take it as an honor to be the sacrifice. This isn't so much of a complaint on my end XD I'm just tired of seeing people complain when it's a good thing and a bad thing at the time.

4: The killers should also be slowed by the obstacles like the survivors are. I mean I never really look behind me long enough to notice, but I've run AROUND a tree before and they've hit me through the tree. So just make the obstacles a little more against the killer too maybe? Hard for us to get through but also not so easy for them either, more than just the boards and the windows that we can vault through.

But really I do love this game and will keep playing it no matter how many times people complain about how it gets boring. And it's never fun. You always seem to get a different killer. And some are different. They don't body camp all the time, they give you chances. Or they completely miss you . I've had a lot of matches where I have trolled killers into thinking I was somewhere else. And escaping right under the person's nose. It's great. There was also another match where my friend was playing and I was watching. He escaped BY CRAWLING. So again it's all how we make this game fun by just enjoying it. I don't even care about survivor rank anymore. I just want my blood points XD and to troll killers. Is that so bad? Highly recommend this game tho~

Update! I still highly love this game but I hope they fix the camping and the issue with decisive strike currently and how traps work under hooks. Other then that keep up the good work Devs.

Thsi game had its rough patches but is smoothing out really nice! As of writing this I have 39 hours on the game and I wont even lie its been a blast. The devs are active and interact with the community listening to the problems that arise with the game. Overall its a friendly and fun community. If i had to reccomend this to a friend I would because from my experience as a gamer few games have dedicated devs like this. One thing to note is that there are some point of views from both killers and survivors that bicker over certain aspects, if you can ignore those then you should be pretty set. Because here is the deal window abusing is in the game for survivors and camping hooks is in the game for killers so both sides should shut up a little.
Ok so for the develepers who decide to check reviews here are a list of bugs that I come across in the game:
When starting a lobby as a killer the game freezes
Ребят, поиграл в игру час очень сильно понравилась, советую всем !!! Думаю вам направиться, Советую всем !!!

Honestly there aren't much pros, the game is fun until about a 50 hours in where it just becomes a stressful and infuriating experience for everyone involved. At a few hundreds hours the game is just massively unpleasant to play. Keep in mind this review is after quitting and returning to the game a few times, and trying to give the developers the benefit of the doubt and chances to redeem the game.

Here are a few warnings and points I have to make which I feel you ought to keep in mind if deciding to purchase the game:

- Developers

Although reasonably communicative and polite, no input from the community is truly implemented in a meaningful or somewhat timely manner. The game still has glaring core game play issues which haven't been fixed from release. There is also arguably a balance bias towards survivors, the pessimist in me would point out they seem to make up most of the player base and thus omake the dev team the most money. There are awful frustrating gameplay elements which haven't been fixed, but cosmetic releases seem to take priority in their eyes.

- Has one of the most toxic communities I have ever experienced.

The core game play essentially resorts to bullying. The post game chats are awful, the forums are just people complaining with no real input on how to fix their complaints. There is also a fairly cringe role playing aspect now, where people will role play in matches, losing their teammates games. I wish I was making this up. The community also seems to have a strange stranglehold on the devs which may or not lead to lore changes, weird game design and extremely poor balance.

- The Killers are poorly balanced

The power imbalance between killers is the strangest aspect of this game. Stealth killers although able to perform at high ranks, are mostly negated by one perk (Spine Chill), meaning they have to do an awkward crab walk (facing slightly off target where they are going) in order not to be detected. It's weird. Then you have Nurse, a killer who will wipe every match at high ranks, being able to instantly port onto a survivor and hit them pretty much, in comparison to that most other killers are restricted to boringly run around and around "loops", impassible terrain with pallets and vault height walls in between. Most killers have no map pressure meaning games are over extremely fast.

- Boring Survivor Game Play

Once the fear or initial adrenaline has passed, it becomes apparent that the survivor game play is a repetitive mind numbing experience. Every match is essentially fix a generator and then walk off/hide when the killer comes. If discovered, simply run around objects while blocking the killers paths with pallets and waist high walls. There are ofc perks to add "Spice", but once again the balance is so horrendous you'll find most survivors running the same perks, which are at most completely broken, boring and predictable.

- The Grind

The grind for viable perks which are integral to the game play is beyond ridiculous and is frankly immoral. You will spend hundreds of hours grinding for perks on a randomly generated skill tree. Then you will be grinding to unlock those perks on other characters skill trees, and then grinding again to unlock those perks on the characters you want. This process also repeats every time you "prestige" resetting a character. The game's skill tree, called a blood web, feels like a mobile game invention to keep you playing. I don't think core gameplay aspects should be locked behind such a heavy grind.

- The Matches

The matchmaking system is awful. You will find new players pitted against high level killers and vice versa. This becomes worse when most survivors at high level have jaded themselves from playing so much and simply resort to trolling the killer for fun, abusing the many mechanics the behaviour team has turned a blind eye to.

- Survive With Friends

Either playing with voice communication wasn't intended for this game, or the developers never properly tested it's impacts on the game. It is such a powerful tool in DBD it might as well be cheating and unfortunately results in an even worse exaggerated version of the generator rush. At higher ranks SWF Survivor game play derives fun from bullying the killer, the obvious power imbalance between the two becomes glaringly obvious.

- Generator Rushing

The objective of the match is to fix generators to power the exit gates to escape and win. The killer has to stop the survivors from performing these objectives, however currently generators pop faster than fireworks on new years. This of course hurts both sides, as with competent survivors the game simply goes too fast for killers to make any actual impact, eliminating chase time which is supposedly the most exciting aspect of the game. (Unless playing nurse). With a co-ordinated SWF group the game can be over within 3-4 minutes.

As of now SWF is a big issue and is pretty much leaving killers to quit or de rank, in turn leaving only extremely skilled killers in the matchmaking pool who end up stomping new and less skilled survivors. Leading onto the next issue

- Matchmaking and Queue Times

It's no secret there is a shrinking killer pool because of the above issues, I only see this getting worse until the power imbalance is addressed. This leads to more unbalanced matchmaking and longer queue times.

- Strange Perk Design

Decisive Strike: for 1 minute immune to being picked up by the killer. It is not used as a perk to stop the killer from focusing one survivor down but instead to punish the killer for bad survivor play or to hide in a closet to force the killer to either be stunned or have to leave the chase.

Object of Obsession: It's a literally a wall hack, I think you can imagine how stupidly OP this is especially in communicating 4 man teams.

Unbreakable: Pick yourself up off the floor once downed. Now coupled with Soulguard, it is a growing trend in this game to give survivors more and more chances for playing badly, even though they have to be hooked 3 times already to actually die.

- Hook Camping

An issue which has been in the game since day 1. Killers will simply hook a survivor and facecamp them, although this may lead them to losing the match, this takes a survivor and player out of the game making it an unenjoyable experience. This behaviour is becoming more common as the killer/survivor tribal mentality leads to more toxic interactions.

- Cosmetics

Most bar a few halloween and older cosmetics, look absolutely ridiculous and I feel prove that the dev's greed is the priority. They completely negate any tense dark atmosphere the game had and completely eliminate the horror element. It's very hard to take seriously with people running around in bright spandex and bunny costumes. 

- Bugs

The game is full of bugs that can make or break the game for you, most of them freezing the game or your character, one bug even allowing the survivor to view the killer the whole entire game if you glitch on his back. Another wipes away all sounds from the survivors, which is massively important information for killers. They are plentiful and can even delete progress, these have not been addressed or fixed.

In conclusion, I simply feel it's wrong to give money to this company, it's encouraging poorly made games with addictive mechanics and micro-transactions which is in abundance in the game industry already. I had given them the benefit of the doubt but after years of revisiting, it seems that it's not really going to improve the core game play. I want my games to be fun and enjoyable, but this feels soulless and mostly frustrating, compounded by the toxic community.

 This game has such potential but with such passive, slow and money greedy devs I highly doubt it'll ever reach it. All in all, 5/10. Fun for a casual game, get it on a high discount, but expect glaring issues which will ruin it for you at some point.

The game itself is fun, the atmosphere is immersive while the gameplay does keep the player active and entertained. As far as the accessibility go, it doesn't require high end specs in order to be able to play the game. However, thats probably as far as the good things go. The queue for the game is broken to some degree, often failing to join a game and popping me back out to re-queue. The communication between players is very limited as there are no voice or text chat enabled once the game starts. I know that this may be intended to emphasise the genre of survival horror, however with more communication between each member, it can open up more strategical views of the game, such as the distribution of each member, how they will deal with the situation etc. I would like to reiterate that the game itself is fun, however I find it more of a solo gaming experience more than a multiplayer. For those who play just for the fun and horror, this is a great game to consider. However, if you are looking for a team cooperation and tactical thinking type of game, unless you're playing with your friends, you won't be having the most fun out of it.

Dank By Deadlight is a wonderful game. If you like seeing the back of your teammates' heads as they run through the exit gate leaving you on a hook, or particularly enjoy the words "failed to join a game," this could be the game for you. 



On a more serious note, this game is extremely enjoyable, especially with friends, and the devs do a great job fixing bugs. I highly recommend this game for $19.99, even in its current state.

Dead By Daylight é um jogo incrível. É um game estilo pega pega extremamente tático e criativo, que lhe coloca dentro de um mapa onde o único objetivo é sair com vida caso seja sobrevivente, ou matar todos caso esteja na pele do caçador. A Jogabilidade é bem fluida, os gráficos não sao nada de outro mundo, porém o jogo é pesado apenas no ultra, já no low é bem tranquilo pra rodar. Os menus são intuitivos, o sistema de rank e level de personagens é bem feito assim como sistema de perks ( habilidades que o personagem ganha conforme sobe de level) e tais mecânicas criam a vontade de jogar o jogo por mais repetitivo que seja, garantindo portanto uma boa diversão e muitas risadas caso esteja jogando com seus amigos. O jogo deixa a desejar entretanto apenas com relação aos bugs e algumas mecânicas que desequilibram caçador - sobrevivente, e por também não ter sistema de filtro de jogadores por rank, o que pode dificultar pros mais novatos. Mas como um jogo recém lançado, tem tido um ótimo feedback da comunidade steam, um bom numero de jogadores e um bom número de atualizações. Espero que lançem dlc's que complementem a experiencia. Recomendadíssimo!!

Edit Nov/2017: O jogo melhorou bastante, diminuiram os bugs e modificaram mecânicas importantes para a melhora do game. Os desenvolvedores está fazendo um trabalho competente. Recomendadísimo. Mudarei a nota geral de 8.5 para 9.0

NO GERAL: 

Gráficos : 7/10
Jogabilidade : 8.5/10
Controles : 8/10
Diversão : 9.5/10
Atualizações : 8.5/10
Trilha Sonora : 9/10

NOTA GERAL: 9/10

I have a love hate relationship with this game. It's filled to the brim with bugs that just make you stop and go "wtf", but at the same time there's plenty fun to be had once you get a good match or get some friends together to mess around. It's pretty crazy how fast a game can be going your way, then in a split second decision, get you and possibly most of your teammates killed. If you want a good co-op horror game, or just a casual game for you and four other buddies to play, I'd for sure recommend it.

Edit: As of now, I have found myself appreciating the game much more. I put more hours into Killer and I have realized that you can either have the best time or the worst time. There's never any real "meh" matches. After getting used to the metas, getting into higher ranked play and overall just making the whole experience a new world to explore, it's something quite admirable and makes me completely appreciate the game in a new light. Game is a salt fest though, a lot of the community is a brutal and savage wasteland.
